conclusion: Determine how shadows will change when light source moves to back right.
Shadow A is cast by the cake towards the bottom left.
Shadow B is cast by the nail towards the top right.
Shadow C is cast by the roll of paper towards the bottom left.
Shadow D is cast by the ring towards the bottom right.
Shadows will be cast in the opposite direction from the light source.
With light source in back right, shadows will be cast towards the front left.
Shadow A will move towards the front left and may appear slightly smaller.
Shadow B will move towards the front left and may appear slightly smaller.
Shadow C will move towards the front left and may appear slightly smaller.
Shadow D will move towards the front left and may appear slightly smaller.
Final answer: Shadows A, B, C, and D move towards front left and may appear slightly smaller.
